short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Terminal-like to send json-rpc requests and use tools for Odoo developers
short.es: Algo parecido a un terminal para enviar peticiones json-rpc y utilizar herramientas para desarrolladores de Odoo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
All the power of Odoo json-rpc in a really easy way!

Terminal for Odoo:
- View records
- Search, Create, Delete records
- Call model methods
- Launch actions
- Run post request
- And much more!

Source Code: https://github.com/Tardo/OdooTerminal

This add-on is only for technical purposes, DO NOT use it on remote instances where you don't have authorization!! If you access or alter any data that does not belong to you, you are taking significant legal risks!
